Name: Battle Imagine - Celestial Flier
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Celestial Flier's Battle Imagine skill: Ultimate! Azure Tempest.

Ultimate! Azure Tempest
Summon Boss: Celestial Flier to charge forward, dealing Ice Attack Damage. Upon the skill cast, your Haste is increased for a period of time.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Celestial Flier's Battle Imagine skill: Ultimate! Azure Tempest.

Ultimate! Azure Tempest
Summon Boss: Celestial Flier to charge forward, dealing Ice Attack Damage. Upon the skill cast, your Haste is increased for a period of time.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
